name: AstoundCommerce
tag_list: demandware, demanware-partner, demandware-solution-partner, ecommerce, software, ecommerce-solution, ecommerce-software
overview:
Astound Commerce is a Demandware solution partner and leading provider of ecommerce solutions and services for some of the largest brands and retailers in the world including Puma, UGG, Crocs, Michaels, Hugo Boss, Lacoste and Teva UK. With more than 12 years of ecommerce experience and 150 employees, Astound Commerce is a Demandware solutions integration partner for enterprise level retailers.

With our exclusive focus on Demandware environments, our experienced development team enables Astound Commerce customers to optimize the Demandware Commerce platform through custom development, performance optimization, creative services, international expertise and partner services integration.
